def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def shipCode = parse.categoryAvailabilities[0].shipCode log.info shipCode assert shipCode == "NV"
def sailDate = parse.categoryAvailabilities[0].sailDate log.info sailDate assert sailDate == 20250103
def occupancy = parse.categoryAvailabilities[0].occupancy log.info occupancy assert occupancy == 4
def bookingType = parse.categoryAvailabilities[0].bookingType log.info bookingType assert bookingType == "I"
